results.byline: By Richard Sandomir and Daniel Victor
results.title: Franco Harris, Steeler Who Caught ‘Immaculate Reception,’ Dies at 72
results.abstract: A Hall of Fame running back, he died days before the 50th anniversary of one of the most memorable plays in N.F.L. history.

results.adx_keywords: Trump Tax Returns;United States Politics and Government;Income Tax;Income;Trump, Donald J;House Committee on Ways and Means;Internal Revenue Service
results.byline: By Mike McIntire, Russ Buettner and Susanne Craig
results.title: Trump Paid $1.1 Million in Taxes During Presidency, but $0 in 2020, Report Shows
results.abstract: The former president reported a burst of income after entering the Oval Office, but by the end of his term, his tax filings had reverted to large losses, according to data released by a House panel.
org_facet: House Committee on Ways and Means

media.caption: Despite capital gains that boosted his bottom line in 2018, the entirety of former President Donald J. Trump’s core businesses continued to report losses every year, totaling $60 million during his presidency.
media.copyright: Doug Mills/The New York Times

results.byline: By Jeremy W. Peters
results.title: In Testimony, Hannity and Other Fox Employees Said They Doubted Trump’s Fraud Claims
results.abstract: On Wednesday, lawyers for Dominion Voting Systems shared some of the strongest evidence yet that some Fox employees knew what they broadcast about the claims was false.

media.caption: Sean Hannity during a taping of his show in 2019. In testimony on Wednesday he said he did not believe “for one second” the election fraud claims that guests on his show were advancing in 2020.
media.copyright: Frank Franklin II/Associated Press

results.title: 8 Teenage Girls Charged With Killing a Toronto Man
results.abstract: The police said the girls, who ranged from 13 to 16 years old, connected on social media before meeting up, possibly for the first time, on the day of the killing.

results.title: Jenna Bush Hager, Progeny of Presidents, Is Now a Publishing Kingmaker

results.title: As Winter Storm Forecasts Grow Ominous, Millions Brace for the Worst
results.abstract: Much of the country faces dangerous conditions, including heavy snow, strong winds and steep temperature drops. In Buffalo, meteorologists warned of a “once-in-a-generation storm.”

results.title: Kari Lake Will Present Election Fraud Claims in an Arizona County Court
results.abstract: After a judge dismissed most of her claims, two will go forward. Lawyers expect she will have to clear a high bar, and her case relies on a collection of election deniers.
